duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support (SRE/mid-level developer) for tickets tier 1 and tier 2 support.
Handle tickets related to permission issues, data issues, and front end bug issues.
Support a custom product of the company with 60+ tickets to handle.
Utilize Service Now and similar ticketing systems, Datadog, and SQL for observability and troubleshooting.
Demonstrate strong customer service skills and build robust documentation for reference.
Engage in API code development and SQL query to resolve issues.
Desire to work remotely in the PST timezone.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field
